subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees broke through with their first hits of the game in the seventh, taking a two-run lead that A. J. Burnett quickly turned into a 4-2 deficit in the bottom of the inning.
snippet: The Yankees broke through with their first hits of the game in the seventh, taking a two-run lead that A. J. Burnett quickly turned into a 4-2 deficit in the bottom of the inning.
